transcript.text: Shalom Shalom this is Daniel John Lee
with Torah restoration ministries
revival fire has fallen on this precious
cornerstone Baptist Church that is now a
messianic congregation down in Salem
Oregon oh my goodness it was the most
incredible Yom Kippur I have ever ever
experienced and I've been doing this for
16 years now and it was unbelievable
first of all the the worship service I
mean you literally felt the gush of the
holy spirit literally just flooding
through the place it was unbelievable
and then Pastor Rick chesh higher he
gets up there and he starts preaching
under the anointing of the Ruach I mean
just power and what does he do he turns
to first John 3 6 through 11 now I don't
know if you're familiar with that
passage but if you read that passage it
says basically that if you're born of
yah you will not commit sin and it talks
about how you have to have his love his
love has to fill you in order for you to
live without sin he starts preaching on
this under the unction of Holy Spirit
conviction falls so powerfully that
literally this a gentleman that was
basically intoxicated he was in the
front row he kind of come in into the
the building that morning he cried out
for repentance he cried out it was right
there I mean we were getting goose bumps
I'm telling you this Yom Kippur the
revival fire fell like I have not seen
since man back in 1997 when I first got
saved and this this revival hit my
church and Leander it was unbelievable
and and after the service was over I
mean we started at you know 10:30 and it
went all the way into like two o'clock
in the afternoon and it was just like we
didn't want to leave until we going to
have a Midrash after this with the other
elder Dale and it was just really
edifying and then we still didn't want
to leave and of course Yom Kippur
doesn't end till that night so then me
and a couple of others we go to a park
and we start getting into the scriptures
and we're getting so excited that it
goes on and on and it goes on
until it's like basically nightfall more
like hey we're supposed to meet some
people from the cornerstone to go break
the fast so we go to the the home family
buffet or something like that I can't
remember what it's called we go to this
buffet place we go in there and we get
so into the scriptures as we're eating
that they're literally literally closing
up the place like at 10:00 11 o'clock at
night they have to kick us out
we're like ministering to the employees
there then we're out on the the parking
lot continuing to hash things out and
just very intense talking about
scriptures book of Revelation prophecy
and then this security lady she comes up
her name's Andrea and she's like
wondering what's going on so we start
sharing our testimonies with her and she
starts saying how she came out of the
Catholic Church how pagan it was and you
know now she goes to this
non-denominational place and we started
sharing with her the Hebrew roots about
you know keeping Shabbat and keeping the
tour and walking in the fullness of the
fruits of the Holy Spirit and then the
power of the gifts of the Spirit and her
face just lit up and she wants to come
to Cornerstone and this just continued
and continued I didn't get to bed until
2:30 in the morning and then I wound up
staying in Salem I didn't come back to
Portland because the next day a bunch of
people from Cornerstone and and other
congregations we did a pro-life a
pro-life thing where we stood on the
side of Lancaster Avenue which is the
main one of the main thoroughfares in
Salem we have these huge signs about how
abortion kills children and all these
things and we were standing up and gave
me was like back in the 80s I remember
the church was really really militant
about you know Operation Rescue in fact
my own parents they blocked an abortion
clinic my mom was thrown in jail back in
1984 for you know blocking an abortion
clinic and I was like whatever happened
to that why did why doesn't the church
ever rise up anymore and today they rose
up we rose up with these signs and and
you know people were honking and it was
it was awesome and so it's just like it
was almost like Yom Kippur was so spirit
filled and so anointed it just spilled
over into the next day so now I mean
this I tell you this congregation at
Cornerstone the pastor the leadership
the people there yeah is gonna do
something great here I believe we are
going to
the next great revival breakout from
cornerstone and it is gonna spread
through Salem and Oregon and Washington
and for the first time ever the Pacific
Northwest is gonna see a
earth-shattering spiritual awakening and
revival and I'm just so grateful that I
get to see it
hallelujah this is Daniel John Lee with
tor restoration ministries I will post
the website for this beautiful wonderful
congregation below and yes I'm planning
to film as much as I can of the upcoming
feast of Sukkot haha hallelujah this is
Daniel John Lee with Torah restoration
ministries website is WWE and Torah calm
